title: Cypress with Angular
description: Cypress is a next generation front end testing tool built for the modern web. Cypress enables you to write all types of tests.
author: Livada Vlad
reason: Recently added Cypress on my current project, and I had the chance to implement the solution and add it to our CI/CD.

title: Using the first version of the Spring Security authorization server
description: With the deprecation of the Spring Security OAuth project, the community has now no other choice to create a reliable OAuth authorization server using the framework. Recently, the Spring Security team started to work on a new project aiming to cover this gap. Some weeks ago, version 0.0.1 of this experimental authorization framework was released and it looks really promising. Let's take a look together on what's included in the very first version of the Spring Security Authorization Server project.
author: Laurentiu Spilca
reason: Recently published Spring Security in Action and took a look deeply into the implementations related to securing Spring apps as well as the community needs in regards to this subject.

title: Domain Driven Development
description:
The software development community widely acknowledges that domain modeling is central to
software design. Through domain modeling, software developers are able to express rich
functionality and translate that functionality into software implementation that truly serves the
needs of its users.
author: Octavian Gica
reason: Implemented this approach in the past when I coordinated teams that developed some applications from scratch.
